summary: Users accidentally install multiple versions of Temporal packages, causing runtime errors. Need validation to detect and prevent multiple versions of @temporalio packages from being used simultaneously in worker and workflow contexts.
userImpact: Users experience errors and confusion when they accidentally install multiple versions of Temporal packages.
rootCause: No validation mechanism exists to detect when multiple versions of @temporalio packages are loaded in the same process.
proposedFix: Export version information from worker-interface.ts and add validation checks on the worker side; verify in workflow context that only one version of @temporalio/workflow is imported.
keyQuote: we should add some validation for this, e.g. export the version from worker-interface.ts and check on the worker side
